price: Kada ka yi zaton waɗanda aka kashe a cikin hanyar Allah matattu ne. A'a, rãyayyu ne su, a wurin bangijinsu*. Ana ciyar da su.
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ
footnotes: * A cikin Hadisi an ruwaito cewa, Annabi yã ce Allah Yanã sanya rũhinsu a cikin cikkunan tsuntsãye mãsu kõren launi, sunã tafiya da su a cikin Aljanna sunã ci daga 'ya'yan itãcenta da rãna, sa'an nan su kõma zuwa ga wasu fitillu waɗanda aka rãtaye a cikin inuwar Al'arshi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
